channel.title: Mugicians' lyre on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Mugicians' lyre on Chaotic Online

item.title: Everything's in Flux
item.description: In this episode we’ll know a little more about Krystella, a player as unprincipled as Klay that does everything, no matter what, to succeed or to prevent those who cross her path to succeed themselves.

item.title: Out in the Cold
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz’s journey through a dangerous path, with an unusual guidance, to the aid of the reclusive Raimusa in the Crystal Range.

item.title: Over-Under Rent Asunder
item.description: The ancient war between Good vs. Evil in the Chaotic universe: OverWorld vs. UnderWorld.

item.title: The Thing About Bodal
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Bodal, a Creature very talkative, annoying and cocky about himself. We’ll also see the most improbable of all fights in Chaotic.

item.title: War Beasts
item.description: In this episode, after a while without mess with other players, Krystella and Klay set up for Peyton to get the scan of a War Beast, a humongous Mipedian titan as powerful as lunatic and, apparently, uncontrollable
